title: Blueprint, "Central Station Industry Exhibit, Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition  of 1933: Interior Design", 1933
medium: Blueprint, orange color pencil, and graphite on white wove paper, double ruled border
inscribed: Inscribed at lower right: Central Station Industry Exhibit/Layout of LivingRoom/Scale 3/4"=1'-0" Mar 24, 1933/Dwg. 458/C.G. Beersman-Arch. Inscribed with dimensions, instructions, materials throughout. Inscribed in orange color pencil at lower right: MEASUREMENTS iN Red/TAKEN ON THE BUILDING/BY M.E.STRAUS. 5/1/33. Inscribed in orange pencil with dimensions, instructions, materials throughout. Inscribed in graphite with calculations on verso.
description: Floor plan, placement plan for living room of Central Station Industry Exhibit, Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition. Dimensions and measurements of room, with placement and instructions for furniture.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Central Station Industry Exhibit, Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition  of 1933: Interior Design", 1933.
1933. Blueprint, orange color pencil, and graphite on white wove paper, double ruled border. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-280.
